name: Analog Shotgun
description:
Controls:

Using a any gamepad controller (PS3, Xbox360, Logitech, etc..)

Move with Left Analog stick

Shoot with Right Analog stick

'Start' to reset

Keyboard Controls:

WASD and Left click to shoot

'R' to reset

'I' for Info

'F' to Toggle Fullscreen

This is version 3, fixed problems with executable files and joysticks.

Top Down Shooter Highscore game (Actual game description)

TOJam9 - Team DR.J

Programmers:

Domenico Curro

Giacomo Donato

Rick Restrepo

Artists:

Rick Restrepo

Domenico Curro

We borrowed these artist's sprites which we found on the interweb
